name: Briday Bight Bunkin
description:
WARNING! THIS IS A JOKE MOD! DONT TAKE ANYTHING SERIOUSLY OK!

Hi there fellow dude on the streets, welcome to the B mod/BRIDAY BIGHT BUNKIN
this a joke mod where you face off against B, a inanimate sentient B EMOJI, originating from RUSH B, he is the most radical emoji ever!

i have no other words :|
